overview: Natsumi falls ill with the orthostatc dysregulation, also known as the disease that makes it impossible to get up early in the morning. It was the beginning of her school life taking place mostly in the school's first-aid room. One day she meets Hikaru, who seems to have forgotten how to laugh. With the desire to make Hikaru laugh again, a new life begins for Natsumi.
title: Re;birth
